description: Differences between the ordinary multiplication table A004247 and the carryless multiplication table for GF(2)[X] polynomials A048720, i.e. the effect of the carry bits in binary multiplication.
crossrefs: "Zoomed in" variant: A061859, the diagonals 3, 5 and 7 are given by A048728-A048730.
author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 11 2001
